mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(br.KDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS KDATE, t.TITLE, br.SUMMARY, S.STATE, m.MEM_CODE, m.NICKNAME FROM TASK t JOIN B_REPORT br ON t.TASK_CODE = br.TASK_CODE JOIN BR_RESULT br2 ON br.BR_CODE = br2.BR_CODE JOIN STATE s ON BR2.STATE_CODE = S.STATE_CODE JOIN MEMBER_APPLY ma ON ma.MA_CODE = t.MA_CODEP JOIN "MEMBER" m ON ma.MEM_CODE = m.MEM_CODE WHERE t.CP_CODE = #{arg0}

SELECT m.MEM_CODE, count(*) AS NUM, m.NICKNAME FROM TASK t JOIN B_REPORT br ON t.TASK_CODE = br.TASK_CODE JOIN BR_RESULT br2 ON br.BR_CODE = br2.BR_CODE JOIN STATE s ON BR2.STATE_CODE = S.STATE_CODE JOIN MEMBER_APPLY ma ON ma.MA_CODE = t.MA_CODEP JOIN "MEMBER" m ON ma.MEM_CODE = m.MEM_CODE WHERE t.CP_CODE = #{arg0} GROUP BY m.MEM_CODE, M.NICKNAME ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT B.BR_CODE, TO_CHAR(B.KDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS KDATE, B.CONTENT, B.SUMMARY, B.TASK_CODE, s.STATE FROM B_REPORT b JOIN BR_RESULT br ON B.BR_CODE = BR.BR_CODE JOIN STATE s ON br.STATE_CODE = s.STATE_CODE WHERE TASK_CODE = #{arg0}
